data.name: Owner_Onboard_Content
data.value: Congratulations! You now have access to the HomeAway Mobile Hospitality Manager.

data.name: Owner_Onboard_Content_Section1_Content
data.value:
The Mobile Hospitality Manager puts useful information about your property right into your guests’ hands through a mobile website or the HomeAway mobile app.

Here’s how it works: once a guest books your vacation home, we’ll invite them to get the app or go to the mobile site so they can access the helpful tips you’ve provided, like check-in instructions, directions to your rental, and local restaurant recommendations. They’ll also receive a welcome and thank you message, as well as a request to leave a review right before their stay ends.

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Content_Section1_Title
data.value: What is the Mobile Hospitality Manager?

data.value: Congratulations on booking a (Brand.Name) vacation home. To make your upcoming stay even more convenient, all the information you need about your rental is online, so you can access it whenever you need it.

data.name: Traveler_PrimaryInvite_Section1_Content

data.value: (Guest.FirstName) has downloaded the app and recently logged into the Mobile Hospitality Manager. Once you’ve updated the content, it will be available to all your guests, so you only have to do it once!

data.name: Traveler_System_SignGuestbook_Title
data.value: How was your stay?

data.name: Traveler_System_SignGuestbook_Content
data.value:
Every vacation must come to an end, and your stay is almost over. But before you get back to the hustle and bustle of your everyday life, take a few minutes and let us know how you enjoyed your time at (Rental.Name).

Click below to let the owner or property manager know how you enjoyed their vacation home. It just takes a minute.

data.value: Please write a review

data.name: Owner_Owner_UpcomingReservation_Content_Section1_Content
data.value: For security reasons, guests cannot view your property’s access information until you approve it. Click “Allow” in the “Pre-Arrival” information of the “My Guests” tab

data.name: Owner_Owner_UpcomingReservation_Content_Section1_Title
data.value: 1. Unlock your rental access information

data.name: Owner_Owner_UpcomingReservation_Content_Section2_Content
data.value: In addition to giving them the ability to access your property, you can add suggestions about where they can eat, get groceries, etc.

data.name: Owner_Owner_UpcomingReservation_Content_Section2_Title
data.value: 2. Add useful information about your property

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Content_Section1_Content
data.value:
The Mobile Hospitality Manager puts useful information about your property right into your guests’ hands through a mobile website or the HomeAway mobile app.

Just after they book your guests are excited to find out all the fun things to do around your vacation home and to start planning their trip. They will be invited to access the app or mobile site so they can access local recommendations you’ve provided and check-in instructions, and directions to your rental.

data.name: Traveler_Guest_GuestOfGuestInvite_Content_Section1
data.value: Whether you’re on a smartphone, tablet, or computer, you can click below to see everything you need to know about your (Rental.City) vacation, arrival information and directions, as well as recommendations on which restaurants, activities, and events to check out during your stay.

data.name: Traveler_Guest_GuestOfGuestInvite_Followup_Content_Section1
data.value: Click below to see everything you need to know about your (Rental.City) rental. Whether you’re on your computer, smartphone, or tablet, everything you need is there when you need it – your reservation, arrival information, and directions, as well as recommendations on which restaurants, activities, and events to check out during your stay.

data.name: Traveler_Guest_Invite_Content_Section1
data.value: Whether you’re on a smartphone, tablet, or computer, you can click below to see everything you need to know about your (Rental.City) vacation, arrival information, and directions, as well as recommendations on which restaurants, activities, and events to check out during your stay.

data.name: Traveler_Guest_Invite_Followup_Content_Section1
data.value: Whether you’re on a smartphone, tablet, or computer, you can click below to see everything you need to know about your (Rental.Region) vacation, arrival information, and directions, as well as recommendations on which restaurants, activities, and events to check out during your stay.

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Content_Section2_Content
data.value:
Starting on (Owner.GracePeriodExpiration), your future guests will be invited to access information about their upcoming stay with you. They can also access it online.

Login to the Mobile Hospitality Manager to provide helpful information to make their stay a great one. Once you’ve entered the content your future guests will be able to access it when they book your property!

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Content_Section2_Title
data.value: What do you need to do?

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Content_Section3_Content
data.value:
• Add helpful information such as directions and nearby points of interest
  • Provide details like access codes and Wi-Fi passwords (think about the things you get asked for over and over again)
  • Customize your welcome and thank you messages

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section1_Content
data.value: Starting on (Owner.GracePeriodExpiration), your guests will be invited access information about their upcoming stay at your property. Just after they book your guests are excited to find out all the fun things to do around your vacation home and to start planning their trip. Add content to the Mobile Hospitality Manager so they can find everything they need to make their stay a great one. Once you have provided the content your future guests will be able to access it for their stay!

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section1_Title
data.value: What do you need to do?

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section2_Content
data.value:
• Add helpful information such as directions and nearby points of interest
  • Provide details like access codes and Wi-Fi passwords (think about the things you get asked for over and over again)
  • Customize your welcome and thank you messages

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section3_Content
data.value: You can always access your Mobile Hospitality Manager through the “Hospitality” link in your dashboard.

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section4_Content
data.value: To activate the experience for your guests before (Owner.GracePeriodExpiration), select the “My Guests” tab in the “Hospitality” section and click the “Invite guests” button.

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section4_Title
data.value: Want to activate your mobile experience sooner?

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section5_Title
data.value: See how Lianna is using Mobile Hospitality Manager to give her guests a great experience

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section6_Title
data.value: Learn more about the Mobile Hospitality Manager
